title: Maisie Williams dons bold clashing prints as she cosies up to boyfriend Reuben Selby at fashion bash
text:
She recently revealed her boyfriend often styles her for events.

And Maisie Williams and her model agent beau Reuben Selby made for a very chic couple as they attended the launch of Re/Sourced in London on Thursday.

The Game Of Thrones actress, 22, made a bold style statement in clashing prints as she cosied up to her other half.

Cute couple: Maisie Williams and her model agent beau Reuben Selby made for a very chic couple as they attended the launch of Re/Sourced in London on Thursday

Maisie sheathed her lithe figure in a brown plaid coat that she teamed with a dogtooth and leopard print scarf.

Peeking out beneath her coat was a long black dress with nude stripes that skimmed over a pair of patent black boots.

Reuben was also dressed to impress as he teamed a green satin bomber jacket with black tracksuit bottoms and white trainers.

Dressed to impress: The Game Of Thrones actress, 22, made a bold style statement in clashing prints as she cosied up to her other half

During a recent chat with Vogue, Maisie revealed her boyfriend with helping her pick out her outfits, as he has a flair for fashion.

The iBoy star added that she appreciates having him with her on the red carpet at events as she's not a natural posing for pictures.

Maisie and Reuben first sparked romance rumours in February after they were spotted strolling around New York City holding hands.

Low-key glamour: Maisie sheathed her lithe figure in a brown plaid coat that she teamed with a dogtooth and leopard print scarf layered over a long black dress

She seemed to make the relationship official after he accompanied her to Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner's French wedding back in June, posting a photo of them together on Instagram.

Since then they have gone from strength-to-strength and regularly post loved-up updates on their respective Instagram pages.

Their relationship came following Maisie's split from her long-term boyfriend, Ollie Jackson. Maisie never publicly announced their break-up.
description: She recently revealed her boyfriend often styles her for events. And Maisie and her model agent beau Reuben made for a very chic couple as they attended the launch of Re/Sourced in London.
